title: India’s richest man surpasses Bezos on billionaires list
description: Meet Gautam Adani. His $152.2 billion fortune makes him richer than the Amazon founder but not as rich as Elon Musk.

title: Appeals court upholds Texas law regulating social media moderation
description: The judges ruled that while the First Amendment guarantees every person’s right to free speech, it doesn’t guarantee corporations the right to “muzzle speech.”

title: How ‘Immortality’ developer Sam Barlow designs stories to haunt players
description: The mind behind "Her Story" and "Telling Lies" merges filmed live performances with video game storytelling — just don't call them interactive movies.

title: Scams are showing up at the top of online searches
description: Searcher, beware: That Google, Bing or DuckDuckGo ad might be ‘malvertising’ — phishing campaigns and malware hiding behind legit-looking links
